description: This is a React functional component named 'Step2' that manages a multi-step form's second step, focusing on collecting and validating business profile information including business name, phone number, and optional logo upload with drag-and-drop support.

methods.name: validateFile
methods.description: Validates the uploaded file for size (max 2MB) and type (SVG, PNG, JPG, GIF).

methods.name: handleFileSelect
methods.description: Handles file selection, validates, and creates a preview.

methods.name: handleFileInputChange
methods.description: Handles changes in file input, triggers file selection handling.

methods.name: handleDrag
methods.description: Handles drag events for drag-and-drop file uploads.

methods.name: handleDrop
methods.description: Handles the drop event for files onto the upload area.

methods.name: handleLogoClick
methods.description: Triggers file input click when the upload area is clicked.

methods.name: removeLogo
methods.description: Removes the uploaded logo and resets related states.

methods.name: handleBusinessNameChange
methods.description: Updates business name state and clears error if valid.

methods.name: handlePhoneChange
methods.description: Updates phone state and validates the phone number format.

methods.name: handleNext
methods.description: Validates form fields and proceeds to the next step if valid.
